title: 32 Things on Sale You’ll Actually Want to Buy: From Hunter to Lululemon
text:
32 items in this article 31 items on sale! Photo: courtesy of the retailers

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

This week’s dive into the best of the best of the internet’s sales features a ton of autumnal goodies, like some houndstooth loafers for under $50, a potentially-not-supposed-to-be-on-sale sweater, and a puffer that feels like wearing a sleeping bag.

Lululemon Wanderer Jogger $89 (was $118, now 25% off) We love a Lululemon pant that’s some cross between a pair of pajamas, gym gear, and work slacks. These sweat-wicking Wanderer Joggers, available in green and navy as well as black, are supposedly also ideal for “flights, drives, or relaxed afternoons.” $89 at Lululemon Buy

Lululemon Cross It Off Tote 20L $39 (was $58, now 33% off) Also from Lululemon: a super lightweight slouchy triangle-shaped tote bag that has a snap closure and interior zip pocket. $39 at Lululemon Buy

MoDRN Scandinavian Finna Ladder Bookcase $237 (was $279, now 15% off) It almost looks like it could be from Hay. $237 at Walmart Buy

Isabel Marant Etoile Arsy High-Rise Velvet Jeans $90 (was $280, now 68% off) Things in the Matches Fashion sale bin are an extra 20 percent off, which means that it might be time for some velvet pink high-waisted pants from Isabel Marant. $90 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Raey Vintage Floral-Print Silk Slip Dress $109 (was $272, now 60% off) Wear this with a white T-shirt underneath when the weather gets a little cooler. $109 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Ganni Fenn Wool-Blend Bouclé Jacket $124 (was $311, now 60% off) This Ganni jacket will actually get you excited about jacket season. $124 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Cult Gaia Cora Wooden-Beaded Bag $75 (was $158, now 53% off) A Cult Gaia bag that’s actually kind of fall-appropriate. $75 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Haight Heart V-Neck Wrap Crepe Midi Dress $98 (was $305, now 68% off) This millennial mustard midi dress is meant to wear over a bikini … but we don’t see why you couldn’t wear it to work. $98 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Sir Marceau Tiered Polka-Dot Silk Dress $223 (was $558, now 60% off) If you have any fancy fall functions on the horizon. $223 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Snow Peak Point-Collar Performance Jacket $150 (was $469, now 68% off) This men’s Snow Peak jacket that we wrote about in last week’s sales post is now an extra 20 percent off now. $150 at Matches Fashion Buy with code: EXTRA20

Champion UO Exclusive Mixed Print Hoodie Sweatshirt $50 (was $75, now 33% off) There’s a lot going on with this here sweatshirt, but it somehow works. $50 at Urban Outfitters Buy

Everlane Modern Flannel Shirt $34 (was $68, now 50% off) This flannel shirt from Everlane was apparently made for “supreme comfort.” $34 at Everlane Buy

Madewell Lorimer Backpack $159 (was $198, now 20% off) This 1990s-feeling backpack from Madewell also comes in brown. $159 at Madewell Buy

Eloquii V-Neck Contrast Stitching Dress $77 (was $110, now 30% off) It should be noted that this contrast-stitch dress from Eloquii runs a little big (so size down). $77 at Eloquii Buy

Kenneth Cole Reaction Men's Indy Sneaker $27 (was $80, now 66% off) Apparently there is an Amazon shoe outlet, and we found some treasures in there, including this men’s boot-sneaker hybrid from Kenneth Cole. (Note: While the description says these are women’s shoes, they are not!) $27 at Amazon Buy

Dream Pairs Women's Elatica Elastic Ankle Strap Flat Sandals Also in the outlet are sandals from Dream Pairs (makes of these sandals that often get confused for Margiela). From $19 at Amazon Buy

MICHAEL Michael Kors Printed Cropped Jumpsuit $46 (was $155, now 70% off) This jumpsuit has pockets and is machine-washable — what else would you want in a jumpsuit? $46 at Macy's Buy

Portmeirion Botanic Garden 3 Piece Childrens Melamine Set $12 (was $31, now 61% off) A tasteful children’s dinner, bowl, and mug set from British tableware line Portmeirion. $12 at Macy's Buy

Arc'teryx Women's Atom LT Hooded Insulated Jacket, Beacon $180 (was $259, now 31% off) Stick out among a sea of black coats with this extremely warm but also very lightweight Arc’teryx, which one reviewer deemed “the sleeping bag of jackets.” $180 at Backcountry Buy

Filson Small 32L Duffel $245 (was $350, now 30% off) Nothing projects guy-who-has-his-shit-together quite like a Filson duffle. $245 at Backcountry Buy

Stelen Abi Bold Stripe Mini Skirt $16 (was $54, now 70% off) For $16, how could you not … $16 at Need Supply Co. Buy

Comme des Garçons Play Red Heart Play V-Neck Pullover in Black $196 (was $328, now 40% off) Shhh … we think this Comme des Garçons sweater is not actually supposed to be on sale. $196 at Need Supply Co. Buy

Hunter Original Refined Chelsea Waterproof Rain Boot $58 (was $145, now 60% off) We like the chalky hue of these 60 percent off Hunter rain boots. $58 at Nordstrom Buy

Topshop Kota Crop Faux Leather Moto Jacket $48 (was $95, now 49% off) This faux-leather jacket really doesn’t look very faux. $48 at Nordstrom Buy

Calvin Klein Body Defining Trunk - Pack of 3 $20 (was $43, now 53% off) Not much to see here, just a three-pack of Calvin Klein boxer-briefs. $20 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cream $17 (was $30, now 43% off) It’s very rare to see classic Kiehl’s products this cheap. $17 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

NARS Velvet Lip Glide Duo $7 (was $16, now 56% off) Or anything NARS-related (let alone this adorable little lip gloss duo) for under ten bucks. $7 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Keds Anchor Sneakers $24 (was $55, now 56% off) Meanwhile, all sale items are an additional 40 percent off, like these cheerful red canvas Keds. $24 at Anthropologie Buy

Sam Edelman Jordy Loafers $48 (was $120, now 60% off) And these patent-leather houndstooth loafers from Sam Edelman. $48 at Anthropologie Buy

description: This week’s Friday sales roundup includes goodies from Hunter, Madewell, Nordstrom, Walmart, Everlane, Amazon, Macy’s, Michael Kors, and more.
